offer_settings.coupon_offer: Receive a 10% discount off the best available rates.

marks.terms:
Unless otherwise stated above, for this offer to be valid, the cardmember shall:
(1) pay with a Diners Club or any card within the partner network which is mutually agreed upon, in writing by the parties;
(2) show the offer in print or mobile phone; and
(3) if explicitly required by the merchant, enter the promotional code if purchasing online.
Only one offer per cardmember can be used and cannot be combined with any other offer, unless otherwise stated. This offer is non-refundable, transferable and carries no monetary alternative.
marks.name: Diners Club Acceptance Mark

offer_settings.terms:
<p>Three-star hotel Kampa Garden Superior is situated in the centre of Prague on one of the most beautiful city islands in the world, just a few steps from famous historical monuments as the Charles bridge or the Prague Castle. Of course there are many other sightseeing locations in reachable distance: Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, John Lennon Wall, Petřín etc. For its unique location in the center of Prague 1, hotel is easily accessible from the airport, railway and bus stations by public transport or by car as well. The original building used to be an orphanarium for blind girls. It was consecrated together with the chaple by the Prague arcibishop himself in 1932. Hotel Kampa was reconstructed in 2011. It’s current form offers quiet accommodation in two single rooms, 23 double rooms, 8 superior double rooms and two family suites. From some rooms you will have a unique view of the canal Certovka.</p>
<p>This offer is valid only for payments made with Diners Club cards and cannot be combined with any other offers.</p>
